resources.string:
Hello, I am Jitendra Rawat, a dedicated computer science graduate student at Pace University Seidenberg School of Computer Science and Information Systems in New York City. Originally hailing from the vibrant landscape of India, I bring a global perspective to my academic pursuits.


I am currently immersed in pursuing a Master of Science (MS) in Computer Science with a specialization in Software Development at Pace University. My academic journey here has been marked by a strong commitment to excellence.


Prior to my current academic endeavor, I earned my Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) degree from DIT University in Dehradun, India, where I graduated in July 2020 with a CGPA of 6.69. This foundational education equipped me with a solid understanding of computer science fundamentals.

I have a passion for exploring new destinations and cultures, making traveling a cherished hobby that broadens my perspective. In my leisure time, I enjoy watching informative and entertaining content on YouTube, and I find joy in creating lasting memories by spending quality time with friends and family.
